text: Héctor Marcos Timerman (16 December 1953 – 30 December 2018) was an Argentine journalist, politician, human rights activist and diplomat. He was the Minister of Foreign Relations from 2010 to 2015, during the presidency of Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. He was born in Buenos Aires. Timerman died on 30 December 2018 in Buenos Aires from liver cancer at the age of 65.Murió el ex canciller Héctor Timerman ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Argentine journalists Category:Argentine human rights activists Category:Ambassadors Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine diplomats
title: Héctor Timerman
